short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Now every Silverstein can have their day. Automatically switches "GS&P" to "SG&P" online. Does same for other brands.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Don’t get Silverstein’d.

GS&P’s first Chrome extension!

Automatically switches the words “Goodby Silverstein and Partners” to “Silverstein Goodby & Partners” wherever it appears on the internet.

The plug-in also works for other top brands and agencies—like Kennedy+Wieden, Mather & Ogilvy and Bogusky Porter Crispin

Finally give the Silversteins of the world their day.

Watch the video at www.SilversteinGoodby.com.

P.S. Happy Birthday, Rich!
